_header: In that time as was full well
Subjects: scripture texts, Engl. trans. of; Annunciation, feast of
_description: Gospel, ‘Missus est angelus Gabriel’ (Feast of the Annunciation), 48 lines

Bod425.First Lines:
In þat time als was ful welSende is þe aungel
                    Gabriel…
Bod425.Last Lines:
…Als oon has saide so mot it beafter thi worde vnto
                    me
